name: TheLastTrain
description:
"The Last Train" is a monochromatic pixel RPG game that alternates between the train and the barren wilderness. The protagonist, along with their secret companion, boards the train to collect supplies and overcome challenges on their journey to the long-gone Spring. During this brief yet unforgettable adventure, you will encounter and part ways with various passengers, and support each other with the enigmatic creatures in containers, as you uncover information about this strange and desolate land.

Train Locations
A cozy and reassuring shelter that protects you from the dangerous radiation outside.
Get to know peculiar passengers here and engage in conversations to advance the story.


Wilderness Environments
The desolate wasteland after the demise, where unknown radiation constantly drains your energy.
Collect as many resources as possible within limited time and seek to understand everything about this world.


Game Features
- Fantasy creatures as protagonists, encountering a variety of quirky beings.
- Smooth and coherent storyline, progressing through exploration and dialogue.
- Venture into unknown environments, ensuring your survival and that of your companions.
- Your actions will determine the ultimate fate of you and your companions.

Controls and Gameplay
- Arrow keys/WASD: Move character or select options.
- X: Open/Close menu.
- Z: Confirm/Select.

Additional Information
The game process takes about 2-4 hours
Cover Art By.PPMiecoo

Thank you for reading all the way here!"
